snippet.title: The last cockfighter tells all
snippet.description:
The last cockfighter tells all by William Browning on Jan 16 2013, 12:02p
A man I will call Clyde won his first four-cock derby on a cool spring Saturday at a place called The Milk Dairy in Tickfaw down in Tangipahoa Parish., La. Then he drove back home to Mississippi....

snippet.title: Yuri Zhirkov Faces The Boo Boys As Russia Defeat Serbia
snippet.description:
Yuri Zhirkov Faces The Boo Boys As Russia Defeat Serbia by Eliot Rothwell on Aug 11 2011, 9:24a
Eastern Europe correspondent Eliot Rothwell explains the story surrounding the booing of Yuri Zhirkov in Russia's 1-0 win over Serbia on Wednesday.

snippet.title: Special K wins another race by stepping on another's toes: The Kroger 200 Review
snippet.description:
Special K wins another race by stepping on another's toes: The Kroger 200 Review by Troy J. on Aug 2 2011, 12:59a
Brad Keselowski has really become the king of winning races by being an overly agressive driver. Almost every win that Keso has racked up has been by wrecking someone, or knocking someone out of...

snippet.title: NNS: Keselowski Wins Last NASCAR Race at Indianapolis Raceway Park
snippet.description:
NNS: Keselowski Wins Last NASCAR Race at Indianapolis Raceway Park by MattWeaver on Jul 31 2011, 12:06a
In what might have been the last NASCAR race held at Lucas Oil Raceway, Brad Keselowski shoved past Ricky Stenhouse Jr. late to win the Kroger 200 in Clermont, Indiana. Restarting eighth with 17...

snippet.title: The Cavaliers' Losing Streak: A Four-Act Play Of Failure In Cleveland
snippet.description:
The Cavaliers' Losing Streak: A Four-Act Play Of Failure In Cleveland by Jon Bois on Feb 10 2011, 9:55a
On Wednesday, the Cavs lost their 26th straight game, tying the record for the longest losing streak in major pro American sports. Just behind them on the list: baseball's 1899 Cleveland Spiders....
